availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Braxton [Unknown] (Enslaved by Robert Jefferson Breckinridge in Fayette County, Kentucky)

body.p: Fayette County, Kentucky, enslaved man and resident. Resident of Fayette County, Kentucky in 1861. Enslaved by Robert Jefferson Breckinridge in Fayette County in 1861. Arrested and tried for the murder of an unknown enslaved man in Fayette County in 1861. Self-emancipated from Robert Jefferson Breckinridge between 1862 and 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, District 2, p. 437A.
KYR-0001-004-0715.
